ValidationRule.description: If a Unit is selected for Sale, prevent save where "Unit" is blank
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($User.Username <>'rgali@blackdiamondgroup.com', Trans_Category__c = "Sale", NOT(OR(SBQQ__ProductFamily__c = 'Customization', SBQQ__ProductFamily__c = 'IPS', SBQQ__ProductFamily__c = 'DWS') ) , NOT( Product_Code__c = 'New Manufactured Unit - Sale'), ISBLANK( Unit__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Unit products must have a value selected in the 'Unit' field.
